name: render_story_scenarios
description: Render story documents with scenarios section added (and scenario outlines with examples if decision criteria chosen)
template: templates/story-doc-scenarios.md (for regular scenarios), templates/story-doc-examples.md (for scenario outlines with examples)
process: Load story graph from project area
For each story in graph, load existing story document
Add Background section if story has background steps
Add Scenarios section with all scenarios from graph
IF decision criteria = 'Yes': Add Scenario Outlines section with Examples tables
Save updated story documents to project area
